quotes: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Necessity is the mother of invention.
Blessed are the curious, for they shall have adventures.
The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.
Sometimes the smallest things take up the most room in your heart.
The internet could be a very positive step toward education, organization and participation in a meaningful society.
Music is the divine way to tell beautiful, poetic things to the heart.
Robots are the new middle class. And everyone else will either be an entrepreneur or a temp.
I love the silent hour of night, for blissful dreams may then arise.
Sometimes a smile says more than a thousand words.
Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself.
Every living cell is a marvel of complexity.
Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.
Strength grows in the moments when you think you can't go on but you keep going anyway.
The environment is where we all meet; where we all have a mutual interest.
The eyes are the mirror of the soul.
The brain is like a muscle. When it is in use we feel very good. Understanding is joyous.
You are a spark that can ignite the world.
Breathe deeply, and let your soul catch up with your body.
The heart is the engine of life.
Everything is made of atoms. That's the beginning of understanding.
Even the smallest element plays a vital role.
If you think you understand quantum mechanics, you don't understand quantum mechanics.
You are more powerful than you know.
Genes load the gun, but lifestyle pulls the trigger.
You are forged from the elements of stars.
Not all heroes wear capes—some are microscopic.
Balance is not something you find, it's something you create.
Your body speaks in chemicals. Listen to it.
Even the rarest elements have their place.
You are built from the building blocks of life.
You shine, even in trace amounts.
Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
Even the smallest dose can have the biggest impact.
Life is a series of chemical reactions. Make yours count.
Handle with care—your body is a masterpiece.
You carry the code of generations.
Even the heaviest burdens can be carried lightly with the right mindset.
Your energy is your currency. Spend it wisely.
You are a mosaic of elements, each with a purpose.
Your thoughts are electric. Your feelings are chemical.
Even the smallest trace of strength can carry you through the darkest times.
Your body whispers before it screams. Listen early.
Your sacred space is where you can find yourself over and over again.
Every connection you make rewires your world.
Balance is not something you find, it's something you create.
What doesn't kill you makes you stronger.
You are built from resilience and rare elements.
Resilience is knowing that you are the only one that has the power to pick yourself up.
